End Point Device List End Point Template Manager End Point Configuration End Point Advanced Settings
PBX End Point Manager supports automated deployment of multiple manufacturers IP telephones.
*2.10.0.2* Bump for 2.10 *2.9.2.2* Added status lights *2.9.2.0* Fixes #5282, #5264, #4895, #5155, #4971, #5282, #5233 *2.9.1.3* Remove Firmware upon uninstall of Endpoint Manager, Force Firmware install for certain phones (#5155), Better Timezone Support (#4895) *2.9.1.2* Added ability to export phone modules. *2.9.1.0* Fixed various issues *2.9.0.9* #4950 *2.9.0.8* Fixed #5068, Took off RC status. Fixed Version Numbering. *2.9.0.3RC9* Fixed #4878, #4956, #4946, #4950 *2.9.0.3RC6* Fixed Device + User Mode (http://www.freepbx.org/forum/freepbx/users/device-user-mode), #4792 *2.9.0.0* bumped for 2.9, removed errors in module.xml causing erors for online xml parsing
